Title:
A new species of crepidotoid Entoloma from Hainan Island of
China
Abstract:
Entoloma crepidotoides was described from Hainan Island in
southern China. The new species was characterized by its crepidotoid
habit, white to pinkish fibrillose-tomentose pileus, 6â“7 angled
basidiospores, and rare clamp connections. Phylogenetic analyses of the
new species and related taxa based on nLSU, mtSSU and RPB2 sequences
were provided.
